data.title: California Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) announces intent to prepare an Environmental Impact Report (EIR) for the Licensing of Commercial Cannabis Cultivation in Mendocino County Project
data.excerpt: The public is invited to learn more about DCCâ€™s draft environmental report at an upcoming public scoping meeting later this month.  The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) intends to prepare an Environmental Impact Report (EIR) for the Licensing of Commercial Cannabis Cultivation in Mendocino County Project (Project). The Project consists of the DCC actions to […]
